p: Using topical application bioassay, CNG 1 and CNG 2 essential oils were highly toxic to S. zeamais, inducing a mortality rate ranging from 97.5% for CNG 2 to 100% for CNG 1, respectively. However, they were weakly toxic to T. confusum (17.5% for both essential oils) ( F df2,11 = 8.16; p = 0.009).
